course_description: This course considers how and in what ways Christian social ethics has supported or distanced itself from democratic practices, with attention to whether the practices of Christian institutions can be related to the textual claims.
schedule_location: Th 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_322
